name: Cyber D10tion
description:
We'll get some images in here soon when itch lets us.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Click to attack
  • Scroll to change equipped dice

How to play

In this game, you roll dice as you attack. The result of the dice roll determines the damage. At the start of the game you're given a choice between different dice, which can be three different types:

D4: four sides | D6: six sides | D10: ten sides

You will see the sides of the dice when you choose, these sides can come up equally likely.  The higher the sides of the dice, the slower they are, and the slower your reload. D10 gives you the chance for great damage, but it's slow to use.

The game also randomizes each level and multiple game mechanics on that level

Credits

Art by: Pebll

Music by:  Retcon187
